Description: Mould-made pottery lamp. Ring-handle. Discus decorated with two busts: Helios embracing Sarapis. Angular shoulder; band of semi-circles in relief on upper angle, interspersed with raised points. Kite-shaped nozzle decorated with row of three raised points. Pseudo-base-ring; ΠAPA|MONOY impressed. Red-brown clay covered with a red slip. Plaster mould. Broken handle smoothed down by restorer.
Curator's comments: See ‘Archäologischer Anzeiger’ 1972, p.641, fig.28; ‘Enciclopedia dell’Arte Antica Classica e Orientale Supplement’ I, 1970, p.423.
